Summary

I'm a developer and designer working on enterprise applications and services. Most of the time you'll find me getting my hands dirty with the code of student and faculty and staff facing applications and data solutions at Georgia State University. As a Lead Application Developer I've worked with a myriad of modern and legacy infrastructure, architecture, code frameworks, and languages. I've dabbled in database administration using Oracle tools; analyzed reams of data to hone in on systemic bugs; trained, advised, and supervised junior employees to catch them up to speed; constructed admin dashboards and student leaderboards to oversee and foster student populations and growth; abstracted, integrated, and automated with CRUD, ETL, SPAS, AWS and other TLAs. I'm a certified cloud practitioner. I'm a board member at a makerspace, bringing cost-effective serverless automations to a non-profit space. And I make time left over for life outside of work.

Experience

Lead Application Developer, Georgia State University ( 2019 - )

  • Serviced and supported proprietary faculty, staff, and student facing applications, and data transfer processes restructuring to remove technical debt, errors, and deprecated and unsafe instructions, and provide continuity and ease of implementation to coincide with changing business requirements and execution environments
  • Personally designed and developed new application solutions to address the needs and direct requests of faculty, staff, and students to ensure continuity of business processes and smooth student interactions with university infrastructure
  • Created generic and reusable configurable applications and processing tasks to integrate with enterprise frameworks allowing for independent internal customer action while preserving user privacy and efficient use of hybrid on-premise and cloud technology

Board Member, CocoOp Makerspace ( 2021 - )

  • Maintain and administer computer systems and infrastructure, automated payment systems, and IOT devices
  • Design & Develop database and administrative applications and portals to manage resources, events, members, and an internal tool lending program
  • Oversee financial operations, generate reports, and maintain transparent accounting practices

Independent Contractor Illustration, Design, Software Development ( 2007 - )

  • Facilitated client business growth and maintenance through versatile use of software and web infrastructure and architectural platforms while developing applications, websites, supplementary plugins, APIs, and microservices; and designing and implementing automated data feeds
  • Negotiated on-premise or remotely with domestic and international clients comprising small and midsize business owners and enterprise professionals to gauge project requirements, propose feasible and scalable solutions and budgets, and service existing infrastructure
  • Collaborated with small business executives to craft accurate and meaningful representations of their brands through oversight, design, and production of media, publications, and other brand collateral
  • Managed client relationships to provide consistent and satisfactory deliverables including illustrations, layouts, logos, advertising, and a regular publication for an international audience
